Uses of Class
com.shaft.gui.element.PlayWrightElementActions

Packages that use PlayWrightElementActions
Package Description
com.shaft.gui.element  

  • Uses of PlayWrightElementActions in com.shaft.gui.element

    Methods in com.shaft.gui.element that return PlayWrightElementActions
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.click​(java.lang.String elementLocator)
    Clicks on a certain element using PlayWright, or JavaScript
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.doubleClick​(java.lang.String elementLocator)
    Double-clicks on an element using PlayWright's Actions Library
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.dragAndDrop​(java.lang.String sourceElementLocator, java.lang.String destinationElementLocator)
    Drags the source element and drops it onto the destination element
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.dragAndDropByOffset​(java.lang.String sourceElementLocator, int xOffset, int yOffset)
    Drags the source element and drops it onto the determined offset
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.hover​(java.lang.String elementLocator)
    Hovers over target element.
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.hoverAndClick​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> hoverElementLocators, java.lang.String clickableElementLocator)
    Hovers over the hoverElements in sequence then clicks the clickableElement
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.keyPress​(java.lang.String elementLocator, java.lang.String key)
    Sends a keypress to the target element.
    static PlayWrightElementActions ElementActions.performElementAction​(com.microsoft.playwright.Page page)  
    PlayWrightElementActions ElementActions.performPlayWrightElementAction()  
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.switchToIframe​(java.lang.String elementLocator)
    Switches focus to a certain iFrame, is mainly used in coordination with #switchToDefaultContent(Webpage) to navigate inside any iFrame layer and go back to the main page
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.type​(java.lang.String elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.typeAppend​(java.lang.String elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Appends the required string into the target element, regardless of the current text value.
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.typeFileLocationForUpload​(java.lang.String elementLocator, java.lang.String absoluteFilePath)
    Types the required file path into an input[type='file'] button, to successfully upload the target file.
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.typeSecure​(java.lang.String elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.waitForElementToBePresent​(java.lang.String elementLocator, int numberOfTries, boolean stateOfPresence)
    Waits dynamically for a specific element to achieve the desired stateOfPresence on the current page.
    PlayWrightElementActions PlayWrightElementActions.waitForTextToChange​(java.lang.String elementLocator, java.lang.String initialValue, int numberOfTries)
    Waits dynamically for a specific element's text to change from the initial value to a new unknown value.
